Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Arrowhead
Description: Flint arrowhead, polished or re-worked on one of the surfaces, whereas the other has a cortex with a few alterations on the edges and near the tip. The alterations on the edge are on both surfaces and are greatly rounded near the binding.
